artist: Suzuki Harunobu; Published by Yamazaki Kinbei; Carved by Endō Matsugorō; Preface by Hekigyokudō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
marks: poem on each page [東都畫工鈴木春信] {Tōto gakō Suzuki Harunobu}; [彫工遠藤松五郎
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
text: A few months after Harunobu's death, the two-volume Picture Book: The Brocade of Spring was published offering poems alongside illustrations of courtesans. Harunobu must have had completed his illustrations in time for the book before his passing.
title: Picture Book: The Brocade of Spring, vol. 2
